### Tender Announcement: Electronic and Mechanical Components

**Project Title:** Electronic and Mechanical Components Procurement

**Project Reference Number:** cb-211-18073772
**Solicitation Number:** W8486-259739/A
**Publication Date:** June 20, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** July 30, 2024, 2 PM EST

**Project Overview:**

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking a supplier to provide electronic and mechanical components as outlined in the Request for Proposal (RFP) documents. The delivery is requested at two locations: 25 Canadian Forces Support Squadrons (CFSS) in Montreal, Quebec, and 7 CFSS in Edmonton, Alberta. The expected completion date for the contract is July 31, 2025.

**Items Required:**

* 14 items are listed in the RFP, including but not limited to:
	+ Optoelectronic display units
	+ Fluid filter elements
	+ Strainer elements
	+ Cylinder assemblies
	+ Pad eyes
	+ Stop light units
	+ Encased seals
* Quantities and specifications for each item are detailed in the RFP.

**Submission Requirements:**

* Electronic submissions only via email to DLP53BidsReceiving.DAAT53Receptiondessoumissions@forces.gc.ca.
* Submissions must include the supplier's brand name, model, part number, and National Stock Number (NSN) for each item.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Evaluation Criteria:**

* Lowest Price

**Important Notice:**
This tender has expired. Please refer to the original RFP documents for details.

### Resources

* [English RFP Document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/40685/w8486-259739--rfp---english.pdf)
